Plot: Basquiat tells the story of the meteoric rise of youthful artist Jean-Michel Basquiat. Starting out as a street artist, living in Thompkins Square Park in a cardboard box, Jean-Michel is "...
Title: Basquiat
Writer: Lech Majewski (story), John Bowe (short story), Julian Schnabel, Michael Holman (story development)
Actors: Jeffrey Wright, Michael Wincott, Benicio Del Toro, Claire Forlani
